title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2877/88 of 16 September 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2877/88
of 16 September 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Section A of Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 17 September 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 September 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 197, 26. 7. 1988, p. 16.
(3) OJ No L 213, 11. 8. 1975, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 190, 21. 7. 1988, p. 28.
(5) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 123, 17. 5. 1988, p. 2.
ANNEX
